```
prefix=/usr
exec_prefix=${prefix}
libdir=${exec_prefix}/lib
includedir=${prefix}/include

Name: Example
Version: 1.0
Description: An example .pc file
Cflags: -I${includedir}
Libs: -L${libdir} -lexample 
```

in:  C:/Program Files/foo    -> C:/Program\xffFiles/foo
out: C:/Program\xffFiles/foo -> C:/Program\ Files/foo
